title: Interpretation of seeing rejection of adultery in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the refusal of adultery in a dream, adultery in a dream is one of the dreams that many people see and do not know the meaning of this dream. He knows it and this indicates that the owner of the vision is involved in a pleasure that he does not accept and cannot engage in and is satisfied with the exit of worry and distress and the beginning of his affairs, but if he sees that. If he has intercourse with her during that period, this indicates the loss of his trade. Interpretation of seeing adultery in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says: If a man sees in a dream that he is committing adultery in a brothel, this means a rise in the standard of living for a person, but if he sees that he is interfering with a person in adultery, this means that the person himself is being exploited by those around him. But if a person sees that he is trying to lure a woman into adultery with her, this means that this person will face a lot of trouble in the coming period, but if he knows that woman, this indicates his ability to force her to do so. Divorce if he marries. If a person sees himself committing adultery with a female friend, this indicates that he is betraying his friend and causing him many problems. If a married woman sees that she is committing adultery, this indicates that she is suffering from many problems with her husband and that she is not satisfied with her life with him. Interpretation of refusing adultery in an unmarried girl's dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if an unmarried girl dreams of refusing prostitution, this means that she is trying to protect herself and show her purity and honor. If an unmarried girl sees herself committing adultery with someone she knows, this indicates that there are many problems between her and her family, and this indicates that she will enter into suspicious relationships. Interpretation of seeing adultery in a married woman's dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if a married woman dreams of adultery, this means that she is suffering from exploitation and suffers from many problems, and this indicates that she is suffering from great psychological pressure. Ibn Sirin says that if a married woman sees herself committing adultery in her life, this indicates that she is trying to commit suicide and refuses to allow anyone to interfere in her life. If a woman sees in her dream that she is trying to seduce a young man to commit adultery with her, this means that she will fall into many problems and these problems may lead to divorce from her husband, and God Almighty knows best.

title: Seeing golden gouache in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Today, in our article from gptafser.com/, we discuss the interpretation of seeing golden gouache in a dream for a married pregnant woman, a single girl, a divorced woman, a man, and a young man. Interpretation of seeing golden gouache in a dream for a single girl. Among the interpretations of some scholars is the interpretation of dreams for an unmarried girl to see golden gouache in her sleep. It has been interpreted It is a sign that the girl will live a new life full of love, joy and happiness. If an unmarried girl sees the hijab in her dream and places it on her hand. The girl’s vision announces to her that God Almighty will bless her with abundance and abundance of goodness. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream shows her The veil that she is wearing. Good news for the fortuneteller because she will get married soon by God’s command. Golden gouache on a single girl’s dream. Details of her engagement date soon, God willing. Buying a girl in a dream gold gouache. It is evidence that she will get a job if she does not work and that her salary will be large And fixed. Gouache is known as an ornament that a girl wears and adorns. Therefore, scholars interpreted seeing it in her dreams as evidence that the dreamer is a beautiful girl with good morals and reputation. Wearing a golden veil in an unmarried girl’s dream. The ultimate guide to getting rid of all crises and problems in her life, and God and His Messenger know best. Seeing gold gouache in an unmarried girl’s dream. Scientists interpreted this as an indication that the dreamer will soon fulfill all her dreams by God’s command. See also: Gold falling in a dream. Interpretation of seeing golden gouache in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a married woman wearing a gold gouache in a dream. It appears Her vision is that God Almighty will honor her with a lot of money that she will receive from the inheritance. If a married woman sees gold gouache in a dream and she is not pregnant. Good news that there will be a pregnancy soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing golden gouache for a married woman in her dream and she was wearing this gouache on her hands. She declares that her children will always be in good health and have not contracted any disease. Interpretation of a married woman seeing golden gouache in her dream. A sign for a woman that she will live a happy married life full of love, understanding and stability with her children and husband. Golden gouache in general in a woman’s dreams. Great evidence that God will relieve her of her worry and distress because she was not sleeping because of her. If a married woman sees gold in her dream, her husband will also wear it. This is what dream interpretation scholars explain, how much the husband loves his wife, and the strong relationship that binds her. Some opinions interpreted the vision of a married woman wearing the hijab In her sleep. It indicates that there is someone who shows her his love, but it is an enemy who is trying to deceive her. Interpretation of seeing golden gouache in a dream about the man and its meaning. If a man sees gold in his dream. His vision shows that there are many good things that he will obtain soon, such as a prestigious position. It also indicates However, seeing gold in a married man’s dream indicates the presence of abundant goodness and a lot of money that God Almighty will grant him soon. Seeing gold gouache in a dream indicates a married man. The Almighty God will save him from sorrows and crises and will pay all his debts.

title: Interpretation of seeing eating coconut in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing coconut by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing peeled coconut in a dream as a sign of food and great goodness that will work in favor of the dreamer. Seeing coconut in a dream may refer to the words of the priest in reality. And whoever sees that he is above or climbing a coconut tree in a dream, this dream shows the attachment of the opinion to a non-Arab. Cutting a coconut means killing a stranger. Interpretation of seeing coconut for a single woman An unmarried woman who sees coconut in a dream is a sign of abundance, comfort and a happy life. Seeing coconut for a single girl may indicate the presence of a stranger in her life. As for the one who buys coconut and peels it in a dream, it is a promise of an imminent marriage to a non-Arab. Interpretation of a dream about coconut for a married woman A married woman sees coconut in a dream, this dream refers to the husband. As for coconut kernels, this is a sign of building and renewing the assets of the house. As for the one who sees coconut, it is a dream that portends good and abundant sustenance. Interpretation of seeing coconut for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees coconut in a dream, this dream is a sign that the child will be a boy. Who do you eat? Coconut tastes good in a dream, this indicates a life full of happiness and goodness in The future. Interpretation of seeing grated coconut in a dream Whoever sees grated coconut in a dream, this dream is a sign of a happy occasion in the dreamer's life. Seeing grated coconut in a dream is a good omen for a woman, as it promises her that what she wants will come true. Scholars also indicated that seeing grated coconut in a dream is evidence of the disappearance of worries and pain and the alleviation of the problems that the dreamer suffers from. And the coconut falling on the dreamer's head, this dream is a warning sign for him of some serious things that may happen to him. Seeing coconut in a dream can indicate success and excellence in the field of work. And we see a coconut tree in a dream that does not contain any coconut fruits, this dream rings the alarm about the arrival of some sad news and exposure to worries and problems. And whoever dreams of eating coconut from an orchard, this dream indicates the acquisition of money and treasures through a woman. Seeing a coconut tree in a dream indicates a weak, sad person who has a lot of money to grow, but he is insensitive. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing coconut in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article We will provide you with an explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing Gog and Magog in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Gog and Magog in a dream or dream via the website roy2a.com Seeing Gog and Magog in a dream indicates committing disobedience and sins and may indicate the end of injustice and justice and piety for the pioneer. Us on the Ruya website. What is the interpretation of seeing Gog and Magog in a dream according to Ibn Sirin in a dream? Seeing Gog and Magog in a dream announces righteousness, piety, and staying away from forbidden things if the person is pious and observant, and seeing the sinner shows an increase in his sins and misdeeds, and the vision is a message to stop sinning. Seeing the resurrection and establishing The scale in a dream announces the extension of justice, the end of injustice, and the oppressed getting their stolen rights. I dream of the resurrection and I stand before God in a dream. It indicates the extension of justice and the fall of injustice, and if it is in a time of war, it indicates victory over the enemies. Seeing Gog and Magog or signs of the Hour, such as the rising of the sun from the west, it announces Good news for the dreamer, his good deeds, the acceptance of his deeds, and the emergence of the truth. See also: Interpretation of seeing gambling in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Gog and Magog in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees the horror of the Day of Resurrection in a dream, it indicates that he is far from God’s approach and he must repent for disobedience. A vision of the exit Gog and Magog in a dream for unmarried women shows that she is going through a difficult time and many trials. If a girl sees the appearance of signs of the Hour, it indicates that she has gone through a bad psychological state, and it may be an indication of the end of injustice, the return of rights to her, and the improvement of her situation. See also: Interpretation of seeing our Prophet Muhammad in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Gog and Magog in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees the appearance of Gog and Magog in a dream, this indicates the end of pain and problems as well as the good of the woman. If a pregnant woman sees signs of the Hour, it states that her due date is approaching. A dream about the terror of the Day of Resurrection and Judgment in a dream about a pregnant woman. It indicates that The sin has been committed and repentance and return to God are required. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Gog and Magog in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees the appearance of Gog and Magog, it indicates her negligence in worship and her distance from God, and the vision is a message to return to God. If A married woman who saw the appearance of Gog, Magog, and Bekt indicates the end of anxiety and anxiety and the improvement of her psychological and financial condition. What is the interpretation of seeing Gog and Magog in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing Gog and Magog in a final dream indicates that he will be exposed to adversity, anxiety, and a lot of suffering. If he sees in a dream a divorced woman walking on the road, It indicates the integrity of obedience to God and the avoidance of sin. See also: Interpretation of seeing Yahya, peace be upon him, in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about the Antichrist? Seeing the appearance of the Antichrist indicates the dreamer’s enemies, lies, and hypocrisy. Seeing the Antichrist indicates injustice, greed, and the spread of magic. What is the interpretation of the dream on Resurrection for an unmarried woman? Seeing the Day of Resurrection for a single woman announces positive changes in her life. Seeing judgment indicates psychological pressure and the problem she is going through. See also: Interpretation of seeing Quranic verses in a dream: We are happy in life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a white dress for a married man

preview.html: If a married man falls ill while he is awake and sees a dream, this means that he will recover in a short time, and seeing him wearing a white dress indicates the beauty of the life of the married man who is dreaming, and a strong will. Interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the man she knows Well. And someone close to her in the dream is wearing a bright white dress in the dream. This is an indication that this single pregnant girl will marry a good man. He suits her and makes her happy and supports her. What if the unmarried woman saw that she was washing the white dress that the man was wearing in the dream and it was very dirty. In the dream. This indicates that this single girl who is dreaming will propose to her. But you will see some things that are not good. Either you will see a man wearing a clean white dress and looking good in a dream for a pregnant single girl who was happy with him in the dream. This indicates that this A single girl will see many things full of goodness and nourishment in her life, God willing. See also: Interpretation of the color white in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that the white dress is very beautiful in a dream. Its shape was very appropriate in her dream. This is an indication that he will encounter many good things. And goodness for her will satisfy her greatly, God willing. Also, if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is wearing a clean white dress, and she was very impressed by his appearance in the dream. This is a sign that this married woman will get rid of all The problems that she sees and lives with her husband at this time. And if a married woman sees in a dream that she is wearing a white dress in a dream, but it was very dirty in the dream. This means that the married woman will be free of problems. What she sees in her life and this makes her sad and she will soon suffer. Interpretation Seeing a divorced woman wearing a white dress in a dream: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband wore a white dress in the dream and its shape was very appropriate in the dream. This is an indication that she will return to her husband again in this period of his life. And she will live with him very happily, God willing. If a divorced woman gives her ex-husband a clean white dress in a dream, and he takes it from him in a dream, and he is very happy. This is a sign that this divorced woman will talk to her husband again and accept her with pleasure, God willing. If a divorced woman wears a white dress in a dream, it is Very dirty and looks very bad in the dream. This indicates that this divorced woman will suffer from some problems that she is going through in her life. She will not be able to get rid of them now, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing one’s husband with an ugly face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a husband with an ugly face in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of the dream of seeing a husband with an ugly face in a dream. It is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he himself wants to find an explanation for it. The site managers do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey the scholars’ interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a husband with an ugly face in a dream. Seeing a husband with an ugly face in a dream may mean that he is going through a very difficult time in his life at that time. Seeing the husband with an ugly face in a dream may indicate the many fears and problems that the husband faces in those days. When the husband sees his face Ugly in a dream, this may indicate a trial that the wife is suffering from at that time, and God knows best. Seeing the husband with a strong face in the dream may indicate serious changes that may occur in his life during that period and he must seek God’s help. Interpretation of a dream about my husband eating meat cooked in Dream: A dream about eating cooked meat for the husband in a dream may indicate the extensive diet that the husband can have on those days. If you dream that your husband eats cooked meat, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life during this period. If you see yourself eating cooked meat in In a dream, this may indicate the permissible money that the husband may earn during this period. In the event that you see the husband eating cooked meat in a dream, this may indicate the solution of a major problem that the dreamer was falling into, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of entering the mosque for the husband in a dream may indicate Dreaming of a husband entering the mosque in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and dreams. It is possible that he will see the husband entering the mosque at the height of the kinship that may bind him to him during this period, and God knows best. In the case of a dream of a husband entering the mosque, this may indicate profits that the husband may gain and abundant money. If you see your husband entering the mosque in a dream, this may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams to a great extent during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about kissing your husband’s mother’s hand in a dream: Kissing your husband’s mother’s hand in a dream may indicate the health and well-being that you enjoyed during that period. If A woman saw herself kissing her mother-in-law’s hand, as this may indicate good things that will come her way in those days. It is possible that seeing one’s mother-in-law kissing in a dream indicates her good skin in those days, and God knows best. Seeing a woman kissing in a dream may indicate happiness. And the family stability that they enjoyed at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a woman beating her husband in a dream. If a woman sees herself beating her husband in a dream, this may indicate the repayment of debts and financial crises to a large extent during this period. The dream that shows the husband hitting His wife in a dream may indicate that he benefits a lot from her advice, and God knows best. Seeing a husband beating his wife in a dream may be a sign of the joking and good relationship that existed between them at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband eating dates in a dream: A husband who eats dates may indicate Dates in A

title: Interpretation of dreams about dough and bread and interpretation of dreams about eating white bread by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dough and bread Dreams, some of which arise from fixations in the subconscious mind, and these thoughts come to us during sleep, and some may convey messages from God, such as visions, and some are dreams from the devil, but we are always concerned with others. Interpretation of these dreams. Bread and dough are good and blessed in reality, so what is the meaning of seeing dough in a dream? This is what we learned in our article, and does seeing it in a dream match its meaning in reality? Interpretation of a dream about dough and bread Seeing bread in a man’s dream means that he will get a lot of money for what is lawful, and it can also indicate the good work that he does or does for many good things in his life and helping others. Seeing dough and bread in a dream indicates the dreamer’s ability to manage his life affairs and that he is good at disposing of the things he has and managing things well. Dividing bread or loaves shows that the dreamer judges fairly among people and that he does what is good to help others around him. Interpretation of a dream about bread and dough by Ibn Sirin Cutting dough into small pieces indicates that he manages his financial affairs and only spends his money on what is useful. Kneading dough is a sign that you will get a lot of money and the doors of livelihood will open for him. Whoever sees that he is eating raw dough and the taste of the dough is bad and spoiled, this is a sign that he does not manage his money well, and that he spends it uselessly. Making dough and not eating it indicates that he finds it difficult to get money, and it also indicates a lack of livelihood. But if a person sees in a dream that he made good dough and kneaded it and its size increased, This indicates that he will get a lot of lawful money and that his money will increase and multiply. Interpretation of a dream about bread and dough for a single woman Seeing pure white dough in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the purity of that girl’s heart, and also indicates her purity and closeness to God (Glory be to Him). When unmarried women see the dough ripening and becoming bread, this means that she will soon get married and achieve her dreams and aspirations. Interpretation of a dream about dough and bread for a married woman If the wife sees that she is baking dough at home and making sweets from it, this indicates a lot of good news that she will hear soon. If a married woman sees that she is kneading with pure white flour, this is considered a sign of the purity of her heart, her good behavior among people, and her good character, and seeing the dough growing indicates kindness, grace, and blessing. A lot of food that will come to her soon. Spoiled dough in a married woman's dream is a bad sign, it may indicate that her husband is facing a big problem in his life or that he is unemployed. If a married woman has not given birth yet, seeing dough in a dream may mean that she will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of a dream about bread and dough for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman making dough and it growing and growing in size is a sign that the date of birth is approaching and that she will have an easy birth without discomfort and fatigue. If she dreams that she is making sweets from dough, this indicates food, goodness and blessings that will come to her and her family

Making dough and not eating it indicates that he finds it difficult to obtain money, and it also indicates a lack of livelihood. But if a person sees in a dream that he made good dough and kneaded it And its size increases, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of lawful money and that his money will increase and multiply. Interpretation of a dream about bread and dough for a single woman: Seeing pure white dough in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the purity of that girl’s heart, and it also indicates her purity and closeness to God (Glory be to Him). When unmarried women watch the dough ripening and becoming bread, this means that she will get married soon and fulfill her dreams and aspirations. Interpretation of a dream about dough and bread for a married woman: If the wife sees that she is baking dough at home and making sweets from it, this indicates a lot of good news that she will hear soon. If a married woman sees that she is kneading pure white flour, this is considered a sign of the purity of her heart, her good behavior among people, and good manners, and seeing the dough growing indicates kindness, grace, and blessing. A lot of food that will come to her soon. Spoiled dough in a married woman’s dream is a bad sign, it may indicate that her husband is facing a big problem in his life or that he is unemployed. If the married woman has not given birth yet, seeing dough in a dream may mean that she will become pregnant Coming soon. Interpretation of a dream about bread and dough for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman making dough and it growing and growing in size is a sign that the time of childbirth is approaching and that she will give birth easily without disturbance and fatigue. If she dreams that she is making sweets from dough, this indicates food, goodness, and blessing that will come to her and her family.

title: Interpretation of red hair in a dream. Meaning of red hair in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about dyeing red hair for a girl, for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman. Dyed hair changes color to yellow. I dreamed that my hair became red, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and others. Red hair in a dream is one of the relatively different dreams that we see in our dreams in various ways, due to the lack of red hair in public life, as some women seek to dye their hair to achieve the utmost elegance in Life, as it gives women a new and very distinctive appearance, and the hair is dyed red and a series of different colors that made her appearance a lot in the past period. Imam Ibn Sirin explained to us in his various interpretations and books, seeing red hair in a dream, in a number of important interpretations and meanings that It may come to the dreamer, which a person must know in detail. Interpretation of a dream about red hair. Head hair means wealth and longevity, and the bridle varies depending on the dreamer. Whoever sees long hair and is satisfied with it, it is good, especially for women. Because they use other people's hair for adornment, and the dream of braiding hair is good for women and bad for others, and a long-term vision. Hair is worthy of praise. Seeing red hair in a dream indicates anger and sadness that are accumulating within the dreamer and that he does not see outwardly. He is generally a very energetic person and always gets his work done easily. His actions are connected with emotion and he values ​​relationships as well. What does hair mean in a dream? In general, seeing hair in a dream symbolizes abundance of money and a long life that the dreamer will enjoy. For long hair in a dream, it means great anxiety and sorrow, but cutting it portends a near salvation from These difficulties. Combing hair in the form of braids in a dream indicates debts that burden the dreamer. Red hair in a dream indicates love, strong emotions, and passion. When a dreamer is happy with his red hair in a dream, this is a sign of his great love for someone close to him, and it also foretells the good that will happen. It is in reality. As for the surprise of red hair in a dream, hatred and resentment, in addition to the intention to take revenge on a specific person, and this feeling increases the darker the red hair appears. Interpretation of red hair in a dream: The color red shows love, passion and emotions. Whoever is happy with the color of his red hair, this indicates his love for a person. He is very close to him and benefits from him. As for the one who is not satisfied or finds that he is disturbed by his distress in a dream because of his red hair color or a strange color, this indicates hatred, hatred, and love to take revenge on someone who deceives him. The darker the red color, the more serious the damage that is caused by hatred and resentment, as well as love and affection. Seeing red hair in a dream shows that many situations will occur in the life of the visionary, which will force him to make important decisions, but he will go through a difficult period during which he will face tension and sadness. They are intense. Notification of the passage of these events after a while. As for seeing a man’s hair red, it indicates the deterioration of family life due to excessive jealousy between the spouses, as for the pregnant woman

As for seeing a man’s hair red, it indicates the deterioration of family life due to excessive jealousy between the spouses, as for the pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of chess in a dream - Seeing chess in a dream

preview.html: Chess in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Playing chess for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman. Interpretation of chess in a dream: Chess in a dream indicates coexistence with people, and the king has a great city, joys and pleasures, and playing chess, dice, and heels is cunning, deception, and temptation. And whoever sees that he is playing chess, he has a few, Chess is not played by individuals, it is played by officials. If a player is stabbed in his sleep by his opponent, then he gets a leg, if he gets a horse, then he gets a knight, and if he gets an elephant, then he gets a foreign king. And whoever sees that he is playing chess, He strives to fight and fight, and chess in a dream is a false reason. Whoever dreams: to play and win, then sees in himself awake what he saw of his opponent in the fight, and chess is war and hostility, knowing secrets, moving from one situation to another, and deviation in mood and travel. He said. Ibn Sirin in his interpretation of a dream about chess: Playing chess, dice, and heels is distasteful in visions, because it indicates competition and strife. The venerable Sheikh added in his interpretation of the game of chess: Playing with everything is rejected in dreams because of God Almighty’s words in his precise revelation: {Or did the people of the town think that our evil would come to them in the morning while they were playing customs?} Verse 98. He also said: Whoever dreams that he is playing chess will have an enemy. Clear. The good thing about seeing it is that the dreamer sees his victory in it. Ibn Sirin considered that whoever sees in his dream as if he is playing chess with a person, then he is fighting in a dispute or a fight, and God knows best. The modern interpretation or psychological approach to the meaning of chess in a dream When games, shapes, and groups of opposing pieces and boxes appear in the dream, the dreamer is preparing for a decisive confrontation first. With himself and then with life in general. It is a set of conflicts, contradictions and transformations that can suddenly appear in life on a practical level and can leave a positive or negative impact, depending on the outcome of the interview. Interpretation of the chessboard in a dream The chessboard in a dream is the world that rises and falls, and in it who lives and who dies and who dies appears. In it are the upright and moderate, and in it war also takes place, and in it there is hatred and temptation. And envy, wealth and poverty. Seeing chess in a dream indicates rectitude in matters and may indicate concealment, sudden death, honesty in words, and a pregnant woman in continuous labor. It symbolizes the land of confrontation and the chess pieces symbolize skills, status and power. The stronger and larger the dreamer’s cut is than his opponent’s cut in the dream, the dream indicates victory and clear victory in life. Pawns and pawns in visions are a symbol of people on whom you depend a lot, but you do not give them due attention except when you need them, believing that they are a group of hypocrites who do not More.The rook in a chess dream represents a safe home or an honest person. It holds a special place in your heart and you should never leave it unless you feel the need to. Negligence here may be selling a property that is dear to you or something similar. Perhaps the separation of a loved one for compelling reasons, such as traveling to Persia
